com.zoolife.model

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zoolife.model.Loader

  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads the initial ZooLife application properties. Note: These properties are currently hard-coded in this class, but could in the future be extended to load from an external source (e.g. from file)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tarek Oraby

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loader()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Animal> loadAnimals()
      Loads and returns the set of Animal objects that the zoo should contain Note: The set of animals are currently hard-coded in this method.
      int loadMaxLosableFriends()
      Loads and returns the maximum number of friends that each zoo animal can loose per round of simulation (day) Note: this maximum number is currently hard-coded in this method.
      int maxGainableFriends()
      Loads and returns the maximum number of friends that each zoo animal can gain per round of simulation (day) Note: this maximum number is currently hard-coded in this method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Loader

        public Loader()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAnimals

        public java.util.Set<Animal> loadAnimals()
        Loads and returns the set of Animal objects that the zoo should contain Note: The set of animals are currently hard-coded in this method. In the future, this method could be extended to load the set of zoo animals from file
        Returns:
        a HashSet of Animal objects that the zoo should contain

      • loadMaxLosableFriends

        public int loadMaxLosableFriends()
        Loads and returns the maximum number of friends that each zoo animal can loose per round of simulation (day) Note: this maximum number is currently hard-coded in this method. In the future, this method could be extended to load the number from file
        Returns:
        maximum number of friends each animal can loose per day

      • maxGainableFriends

        public int maxGainableFriends()
        Loads and returns the maximum number of friends that each zoo animal can gain per round of simulation (day) Note: this maximum number is currently hard-coded in this method. In the future, this method could be extended to load the number from file
        Returns:
        maximum number of friends each animal can gain per day
